verbose_text: Similarly, in this study, DIO mitigated CCl 4 -induced oxidative and nitrative stresses confirming previous studies that showed that DIO alleviates the oxidative stress caused by aflatoxin [XREF_BIBR], methotrexate [XREF_BIBR] by increasing GSH levels, lowering NO levels, and enhancing the activity of antioxidant enzymes.
